short.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Death Note wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Death Note background. Death Note wallpaper theme for anime fans.
short.ca: Canvia la pàgina de pestanya nova de l'extensió de Death Note Anime Wallpaper amb el fons de pantalla de fons HD de Death Note.
short.cs: Rozšíření Tapeta Death Note Anime mění stránku nové karty s tapetou Death Note HD na pozadí. Motivy pro fanoušky Death Note.
short.da: Death Note Anime Wallpaper udvidelse skift ny fane med Death Note tapet HD baggrund. Temaer til Death Note Anime fans.
short.de: Todesmeldung Anime Wallpaper Erweiterung neue Registerkarte mit Todesmeldung Wallpaper HD Hintergrund ändern. Für Death Note Fans.
short.el: Η επέκταση ταπετσαρίας Σημείωμα θανάτου αλλάζει νέα καρτέλα με φόντο HD ταπετσαρίας Σημείωμα θανάτου.
short.es: La extensión Aviso de muerte Wallpaper cambia una nueva pestaña con el fondo Death Note Wallpaper HD.
short.fi: Kuolonkirje Wallpaper laajennus vaihtaa uuden välilehden Death Note taustakuvan HD-taustalla.
short.fr: L'extension Death Note change de nouvel onglet avec le fond d'écran HD Death Note. Thèmes pour les fans de Death Note.
short.it: L'estensione Death Note cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo HD di Death Note. Temi per i fan di Death Note.
short.ja: デスノートの壁紙拡張機能は、デスノートの壁紙HDの背景を持つ新しいタブページを変更します。デスノートファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 데스 노트 배경 화면 확장은 데스 노트 배경 화면 HD 배경으로 새 탭 페이지를 변경합니다. 데스 노트 팬을위한 테마.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie Notatnik śmierci zmienia nową kartę z tapetą Notatnik śmierci HD. Motywy dla fanów Notatnik śmierci.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão Caderno da Morte muda a nova guia com o fundo HD do papel de parede Caderno da Morte.
short.sv: Death Note Anime förlängning ändra ny flik med Death Note Anime tapeter HD bakgrund. Teman för Death Note Anime-fans.
short.tr: Death Note Anime uzantısı Death Note duvar kağıdı HD arka planıyla yeni sekmeyi değiştirdi. Death Note hayranları için temalar.
short.zh_CN: 死亡笔记壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为死亡笔记的背景壁纸。死亡笔记粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 死亡筆記壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為死亡筆記的背景壁紙。死亡筆記粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
This extension features some of the great Death Note background to make you feel good on your Chrome browser.

Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Death Note wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Death Note background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Search engine using Google.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Death Note new tab.
long.ca,cs,da,de,el,es,fi,fr,it,ja,ko,pl,pt_B:
This extension features some of the great Death Note background to make you feel good on your Chrome browser.

Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Death Note wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Death Note background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose your preferred search engine. Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings option.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Death Note new tab.
